description:
This is a database and associated data treatment that enables software for real-time Raman spectral analysis of sample streams in traditional flow and static solution cells and microfluidic devices.  It will enable a chemometric approach to identify and quantify species of interest, including UO22+, nitric acid, and total nitrate. 
Licensed with right to sublicense.
name: Database and training set enabling real-time, on-line process monitoring

permissions.exemptionText: This source code is restricted by patent and / or intellectual property law.
